name: Star Catcher (itch) (Mugiartes)
description:
Move: WASD

Select: Return

Aim/shoot: Mouse / Left Mouse Button

Our sun is dying because it's core has become weak. The only way to save him and all the mankind is to find a little star that can restore the old core of the sun. Your mission is to find and bring this little star so humanity can live.

This is my first game and that is almost done, but i still need to ballance it better and solve some little stuff, hahaha. Hope you like it!

Mugi

https://instagram.com/mugiartes/
